quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: What goes on inside is just too fast and huge and all interconnected for words to do more than barely sketch the outlines of at most one tiny little part of it at any given instant.
author: David Foster Wallace

quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
author: Oscar Wilde
source: The Happy Prince and Other Stories

quote: If you were half as funny as you think you are, you'd be twice as funny as you are now.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
author: J.K. Rowling
source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
